skills.name: CHOMP
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Reduce Healing for 2 turns.
• The lower the enemy’s HP, the more damage this attack deals.

skills.name: MARK FOR DEATH
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Inflicts 1 Mark on the target for every 10% of their HP missing.

skills.name: MEMENTO
desc: Shatters upon death, applying 4 Marks to all enemies. Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal true damage.
